   20: 
   21: -module(trace_session_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   24: 
   25: -export([test_set_on_spawn/1,
   26:          test_set_on_first_spawn/1,
   27:          test_set_on_link/1,
   28:          test_set_on_first_link/1,
   29:          on_load/1,
   30:          trace_info_on_load/1,
   31:          procs/1,
   32:          basic/1,
   33:          call/1,
   34:          meta/1,
   35:          return_to/1,
   36:          destroy/1,
   37:          negative/1,
   38:          error_info/1,
   39:          end_of_list/1]).
   40: 
   41: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   42: 
   43: 
   44: -undef(line).
   45: -ifdef(debug).
   46: -define(line,io:format("line ~p\n",[?LINE]),erlang:display(?LINE)).
   47: -else.
   48: -define(line,void).
   49: -endif.
   50: 
   51: -export([foo/0, exported/1, middle/1, bottom/1]).
   52: 
   53: suite() ->
   54:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   55:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   56: 
   57: all() ->
   58:     [
   59:      basic,
   60:      call,
   61:      meta,
   62:      on_load,
   63:      trace_info_on_load,
   64:      procs,
   65:      test_set_on_spawn,
   66:      test_set_on_first_spawn,
   67:      test_set_on_link,
   68:      test_set_on_first_link,
   69:      return_to,
   70:      destroy,
   71:      negative,
   72:      error_info,
   73:      end_of_list].
   74: 
   75: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   76:     Was = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
   77:     [{available_internal_state, Was} | Config].
   78: 
   79: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   80:     case proplists:get_value(available_internal_state, Config) of
   81:         false ->
   82:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false);
   83:         true ->
   84:             ignore
   85:     end.
   86: 
   87: erlang_trace(legacy, Pid, How, FlagList) ->
   88:     erlang:trace(Pid, How, FlagList);
   89: erlang_trace(Session, Pid, How, FlagList) when is_pid(Pid) ->
   90:     trace:process(Session, Pid, How, FlagList).
   91: 
   92: erlang_trace_pattern(legacy, MFA, MS, FlagList) ->
   93:     erlang:trace_pattern(MFA, MS, FlagList);
   94: erlang_trace_pattern(Session, MFA, MS, FlagList0) ->
   95:     FlagList1 = lists:keydelete(tracer, 1, FlagList0),
   96:     FlagList3 = case lists:keytake(meta, 1, FlagList1) of
   97:                     {value, {meta,_Tracer}, FlagList2} ->
   98:                         [meta | FlagList2];
   99:                     false ->
  100:                         FlagList1
  101:                 end,
  102:     trace:function(Session, MFA, MS, FlagList3).
  103: 
  104: 
  105: on_load(_Config) ->
  106:     Tester= self(),
  107:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  108:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  109:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  110:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  111:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  112:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  113: 
  114:     catch erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  115:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  116:     catch erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  117: 
  118:     on_load1(S1, Tracer1),
  119:     on_load2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  120:              S2, Tracer2, []),
  121:     on_load2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  122:              S2, Tracer2, []),
  123:     on_load2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  124:              legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  125: 
  126:     on_load2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  127:              S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  128:     on_load2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  129:              S1, Tracer1, []),
  130: 
  131:     ok.
  132: 
  133: trace_info_on_load(_Config) ->
  134:     Tester = self(),
  135:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer", Tester) end),
  136:     S = trace:session_create(?MODULE, Tracer, []),
  137:     1 = trace:process(S, self(), true, [call]),
  138:     0 = trace:function(S, on_load, true, []),
  139:     {all,[{traced,global},
  140:       {match_spec,[]},
  141:       {meta,false},
  142:       {meta_match_spec,false},
  143:       {call_count,false}]} = trace:info(S, on_load, all),
  144:     ok.
  145: 
  146: on_load1(Session, Tracer) ->
  147:     Tracee = self(),
  148:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [call]),
  149:     0 = trace:function(Session, on_load, true, []),
  150:     dummy:module_info(),
  151:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  152:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  153:     ?line,
  154:     {Tracer, {trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}} = receive_any(),
  155:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [call]),
  156:     dummy:module_info(),
  157:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  158:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  159:     ?line,
  160:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  161:     0 = trace:function(Session, on_load, false, []),
  162:     ok.
  163: on_load2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  164:     Tracee = self(),
  165:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [call|Opts1]),
  166:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [call|Opts2]),
  167:     Opts1_1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts1),
  168:     Opts2_1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts2),
  169:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, on_load, true, Opts1_1),
  170:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, on_load, true, Opts2_1),
  171:     dummy:module_info(),
  172:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  173:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  174:     ?line,
  175:     receive_unsorted(
  176:         [{Tracer1,{trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}},
  177:          {Tracer2,{trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}}]),
  178:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [call|Opts1]),
  179:     dummy:module_info(),
  180:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  181:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  182:     ?line,
  183:     {Tracer2, {trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}} = receive_any(),
  184:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [call|Opts2]),
  185:     dummy:module_info(),
  186:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  187:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  188:     ?line,
  189:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  190: 
  191:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, on_load, false, Opts1_1),
  192:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, on_load, false, Opts2_1),
  193:     ok.
  194: 
  195: test_set_on_spawn(_Config) ->
  196:     Tester= self(),
  197:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  198:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  199:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  200:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  201:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  202:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  203: 
  204:     set_on_spawn(S1, Tracer1),
  205:     set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  206:                   S2, Tracer2, []),
  207:     set_on_spawn2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  208:                   S2, Tracer2, []),
  209:     set_on_spawn2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  210:                   legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  211: 
  212:     set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  213:                   S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  214:     set_on_spawn2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  215:                   S1, Tracer1, []),
  216: 
  217:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  218:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  219:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  220: 
  221:     unlink(Tracer0),
  222:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  223:     unlink(Tracer1),
  224:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  225:     unlink(Tracer2),
  226:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  227:     ok.
  228: test_set_on_first_spawn(_Config) ->
  229:     Tester= self(),
  230:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  231:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  232:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  233:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  234:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  235:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  236: 
  237:     set_on_first_spawn(S1, Tracer1),
  238:     set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  239:                         S2, Tracer2, []),
  240:     set_on_first_spawn2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  241:                         S2, Tracer2, []),
  242:     set_on_first_spawn2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  243:                         legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  244: 
  245:     set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  246:                         S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  247:     set_on_first_spawn2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  248:                         S1, Tracer1, []),
  249: 
  250:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  251:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  252:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  253: 
  254:     unlink(Tracer0),
  255:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  256:     unlink(Tracer1),
  257:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  258:     unlink(Tracer2),
  259:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  260:     ok.
  261: test_set_on_link(_Config) ->
  262:     Tester= self(),
  263:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  264:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  265:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  266:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  267:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  268:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  269: 
  270:     set_on_link(S1, Tracer1),
  271:     set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  272:                  S2, Tracer2, []),
  273:     set_on_link2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  274:                  S2, Tracer2, []),
  275:     set_on_link2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  276:                  legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  277: 
  278:     set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  279:                  S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  280:     set_on_link2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  281:                  S1, Tracer1, []),
  282:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  283:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  284:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  285: 
  286:     unlink(Tracer0),
  287:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  288:     unlink(Tracer1),
  289:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  290:     unlink(Tracer2),
  291:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  292:     ok.
  293: 
  294: test_set_on_first_link(_Config) ->
  295:     Tester= self(),
  296:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  297:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  298:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  299:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  300:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  301:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  302: 
  303:     set_on_first_link(S1, Tracer1),
  304:     set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  305:                        S2, Tracer2, []),
  306:     set_on_first_link2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  307:                        S2, Tracer2, []),
  308:     set_on_first_link2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  309:                        legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  310: 
  311:     set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  312:                        S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  313:     set_on_first_link2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  314:                        S1, Tracer1, []),
  315:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  316:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  317:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  318: 
  319:     unlink(Tracer0),
  320:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  321:     unlink(Tracer1),
  322:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  323:     unlink(Tracer2),
  324:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  325:     ok.
  326: set_on_spawn(Session, Tracer) ->
  327:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn]),
  328:     Tracee = self(),
  329:     Child = spawn(fun F() ->
  330:                           receive hej ->
  331:                                   Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  332:                                   exit(Pid, die),
  333:                                   Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  334:                                   F()
  335:                           end
  336:                   end),
  337:     Child ! hej,
  338:     receive {done, GrandChild} -> ok end,
  339:     exit(Child, die),
  340:     receive_parallel(
  341:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  342: 
  343:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child, spawned, Tracee,'_'}},
  344:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  345:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  346: 
  347:        [{Tracer,{trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child,'_'}},
  348:         {Tracer,{trace, GrandChild, exit, die}}]
  349:       }),
  350:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn]),
  351:     ok.
  352: 
  353: set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  354:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  355:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  356:     Tracee = self(),
  357:     Child = spawn(fun F() ->
  358:                           receive hej ->
  359:                                   Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  360:                                   exit(Pid, die),
  361:                                   Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  362:                                   F()
  363:                           end
  364:                   end),
  365:     Child ! hej,
  366:     receive {done, GrandChild} -> ok end,
  367:     exit(Child, die),
  368:     receive_parallel(
  369:       {[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  370: 
  371:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  372: 
  373:        [{Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  374:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  375:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  376: 
  377:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee,'_'}},
  378:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  379:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  380: 
  381:        [{Tracer1, {trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child, '_'}},
  382:         {Tracer1, {trace, GrandChild, exit, die}}],
  383: 
  384:        [{Tracer2, {trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child, '_'}},
  385:         {Tracer2,{trace, '_', exit, die}}]
  386:       }),
  387: 
  388:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  389: 
  390:     Child1 = spawn(fun F() ->
  391:                            receive hej ->
  392:                                    Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  393:                                    exit(Pid, die),
  394:                                    Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  395:                                    F()
  396:                            end
  397:                    end),
  398:     Child1 ! hej,
  399:     receive {done, GrandChild1} -> ok end,
  400:     exit(Child1, die),
  401:     receive_parallel(
  402:       {[{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child1,'_'}}],
  403: 
  404:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  405:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawn, GrandChild1, '_'}},
  406:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, exit, die}}],
  407: 
  408:        [{Tracer2,{trace, GrandChild1, spawned, Child1,'_'}},
  409:         {Tracer2,{trace, GrandChild1, exit, die}}]
  410:       }),
  411: 
  412:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  413:     ok.
  414: 
  415: set_on_first_spawn(Session, Tracer) ->
  416:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn]),
  417:     Tracee = self(),
  418:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() ->
  419:                                 receive hej ->
  420:                                         Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  421:                                         Tracee ! spawned,
  422:                                         exit(Pid, die),
  423:                                         F()
  424:                                 end
  425:                         end),
  426:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  427:     receive spawned -> ok end,
  428:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  429:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  430:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  431:     receive_parallel(
  432:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  433:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  434: 
  435:        [{Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  436:         {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  437:         {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]}),
  438: 
  439:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn]),
  440:     ok.
  441: set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  442:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts1]),
  443:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts2]),
  444:     Tracee = self(),
  445:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() ->
  446:                                 receive hej ->
  447:                                         Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  448:                                         exit(Pid, die),
  449:                                         Tracee ! done,
  450:                                         F()
  451:                                 end
  452:                         end),
  453:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  454:     receive done -> ok end,
  455:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  456:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  457:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  458:     receive_parallel(
  459:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  460:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  461: 
  462:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  463:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  464: 
  465:        [{Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  466:         {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  467:         {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}],
  468: 
  469:        [{Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  470:         {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  471:         {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]
  472:       }),
  473: 
  474:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts1]),
  475:     TraceeChild2 = spawn(fun F() ->
  476:                                  receive hej ->
  477:                                          Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  478:                                          exit(Pid, die),
  479:                                          F()
  480:                                  end
  481:                          end),
  482:     TraceeChild2 ! hej,
  483:     exit(TraceeChild2, die),
  484:     TraceeChild21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  485:     exit(TraceeChild21, die),
  486: 
  487:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild2,_}} = receive_any(),
  488:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild21,_}} = receive_any(),
  489:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts2]),
  490:     ok.
  491: 
  492: set_on_link(Session, Tracer) ->
  493:     %% Test set_on_link via spawn_link/1
  494:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link]),
  495:     Tracee = self(),
  496:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  497:     unlink(Child),
  498:     exit(Child, die),
  499:     receive_parallel(
  500:       {[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}},
  501:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  502:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  503: 
  504:        [{Tracer, {trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  505:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  506:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  507:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  508:       }),
  509: 
  510:     %% Test set_on_link via link/1
  511:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  512:     link(Child2),
  513:     unlink(Child2),
  514:     exit(Child2, die),
  515:     receive_parallel(
  516:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  517:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  518:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}}],
  519: 
  520:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  521:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  522:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  523:        }),
  524: 
  525:     %% Test that you can disable the tracer but still get traces
  526:     %% from child process
  527:     Child3 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  528:     link(Child3),
  529:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  530:     unlink(Child3),
  531:     exit(Child3, die),
  532:     receive_parallel(
  533:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn, Child3,'_'}},
  534:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child3}}],
  535: 
  536:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  537:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  538:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, exit, die}}]
  539:       }),
  540: 
  541:     %% Test that you can disable the tracer for the child process
  542:     %% and get messages from the parent
  543:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link]),
  544:     Child4 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  545:     link(Child4),
  546:     receive_parallel(
  547:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child4,'_'}},
  548:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child4}}],
  549: 
  550:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child4, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  551:       }),
  552:     1 = trace:process(Session, Child4, false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  553:     unlink(Child4),
  554:     exit(Child4, die),
  555:     {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child4}} = receive_any(),
  556: 
  557:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  558:     spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  559:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  560:     ok.
  561: set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  562:     %% Test multiple tracers with set_on_link via spawn_link/1
  563:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  564:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts2]),
  565:     Tracee = self(),
  566:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  567:     unlink(Child),
  568:     exit(Child, die),
  569: 
  570:     receive_parallel(
  571:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  572:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  573:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  574: 
  575:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  576:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  577:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  578: 
  579:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  580:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  581:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  582:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  583: 
  584:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  585:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  586:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  587:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  588:       }),
  589: 
  590:     %% Test multiple tracers with set_on_link via link/1
  591:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  592:     ?line,
  593:     link(Child1),
  594:     unlink(Child1),
  595:     exit(Child1, die),
  596: 
  597:     receive_parallel(
  598:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  599:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  600:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  601: 
  602:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  603:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  604:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  605: 
  606:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  607:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  608:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child1, exit, die}}],
  609: 
  610:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  611:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  612:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child1, exit, die}}]
  613:       }),
  614: 
  615:     %% Disable one tracer and test that set_on_link still works for the other tracer
  616:     %% via spawn_link/1
  617:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  618:     Child2 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  619:     unlink(Child2),
  620:     exit(Child2, die),
  621:     receive_parallel(
  622:       {[{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  623:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  624:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}}],
  625: 
  626:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child2, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  627:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  628:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  629:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  630:       }),
  631:     %% Test with link/1
  632:     Child21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  633:     link(Child21),
  634:     unlink(Child21),
  635:     exit(Child21, die),
  636:     receive_parallel(
  637:       {[{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,'_'}},
  638:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}},
  639:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}}],
  640: 
  641:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child21, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  642:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child21, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  643:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child21, exit, die}}]
  644:       }),
  645:     %% Test that you can disable one of the tracers on the child process
  646:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  647:     Child11 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  648:     link(Child11),
  649:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Child11, false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  650:     receive_parallel(
  651:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child11,'_'}},
  652:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child11}}],
  653: 
  654:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child11,'_'}},
  655:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child11}}],
  656: 
  657:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child11, getting_linked, Tracee}}],
  658: 
  659:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child11, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  660:       }),
  661:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Child11, false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  662:     unlink(Child11),
  663:     exit(Child11, die),
  664:     receive_parallel(
  665:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child11}}],
  666: 
  667:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child11}}],
  668: 
  669:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child11, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  670:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child11, exit, die}}]
  671:       }),
  672: 
  673:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  674:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts2]),
  675:     ok.
  676: 
  677: set_on_first_link(Session, Tracer) ->
  678:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link]),
  679:     Tracee = self(),
  680:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  681:     Child1 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  682:     unlink(Child),
  683:     exit(Child, die),
  684:     unlink(Child1),
  685:     exit(Child1, die),
  686:     receive_parallel(
  687:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  688:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  689:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  690:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  691:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  692:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  693: 
  694:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  695:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  696:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  697:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  698:       }),
  699:     %% Test that spawn on first link works with link/1
  700:     1 = trace:process(Session, Tracee, true, [set_on_first_link]),
  701:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  702:     Child21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  703:     link(Child2),
  704:     link(Child21),
  705:     unlink(Child2),
  706:     unlink(Child21),
  707:     exit(Child2, die),
  708:     exit(Child21,die),
  709:     receive_parallel(
  710:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  711:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,'_'}},
  712:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  713:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}},
  714:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}},
  715:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}}],
  716: 
  717:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  718:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  719:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  720:       }),
  721:     %% Test that spawn on first link flag is not on the child
  722:     1 = trace:process(Session, Tracee, true, [set_on_first_link]),
  723:     Child3 = spawn(fun F() -> receive hej ->
  724:                                       spawn_link(fun()-> receive M -> M end end),
  725:                                       Tracee ! done,
  726:                                       F()
  727:                               end
  728:                    end),
  729:     link(Child3),
  730:     Child3 ! hej,
  731:     receive done -> ok end,
  732:     unlink(Child3),
  733:     exit(Child3, die),
  734:     receive_parallel(
  735:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child3,'_'}},
  736:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child3}},
  737:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child3}}],
  738: 
  739:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  740:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, spawn,'_','_'}},
  741:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, link, '_'}},
  742:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  743:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, exit, die}}]
  744:       }),
  745:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link]),
  746:     ok.
  747: 
  748: set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  749:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts1]),
  750:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts2]),
  751:     Tracee = self(),
  752:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  753:     Child1 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  754:     receive_parallel(
  755:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  756:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  757:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  758:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}}],
  759: 
  760:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  761:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  762:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  763:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}}],
  764: 
  765:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  766:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}}],
  767: 
  768:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  769:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  770:        }),
  771: 
  772:     unlink(Child),
  773:     exit(Child, die),
  774:     unlink(Child1),
  775:     exit(Child1, die),
  776:     receive_parallel(
  777:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  778:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  779: 
  780:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  781:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  782: 
  783:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  784:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  785: 
  786:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  787:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  788:       }),
  789: 
  790:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts1]),
  791:     Child2 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  792:     Child21 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  793:     unlink(Child2),
  794:     exit(Child2, die),
  795:     unlink(Child21),
  796:     exit(Child21, die),
  797:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,_}} = receive_any(),
  798:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}} = receive_any(),
  799:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,_}} = receive_any(),
  800:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}} = receive_any(),
  801:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}} = receive_any(),
  802:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}} = receive_any(),
  803:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts2]),
  804:     ok.
  805: procs(_Config) ->
  806:     Tester= self(),
  807:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  808:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  809:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  810: 
  811:     procs_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  812: 
  813:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  814:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  815:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  816: 
  817:     procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  818:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  819:     procs_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  820:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  821:     procs_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  822:               legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  823: 
  824:     procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  825:               S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  826:     procs_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  827:               S1, Tracer1, []),
  828: 
  829:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  830:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  831:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  832: 
  833:     unlink(Tracer0),
  834:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  835:     unlink(Tracer1),
  836:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  837:     unlink(Tracer2),
  838:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  839:     ok.
  840: 
  841: procs_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  842:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  843: 
  844:     Tracee = self(),
  845:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  846:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  847:     unregister(RegName),
  848:     Child = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  849:     link(Child),
  850:     unlink(Child),
  851:     exit(Child, die),
  852:     receive_parallel(
  853:       {[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  854:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  855:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  856:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  857:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  858: 
  859:        [{Tracer, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  860:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  861:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  862:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}]}),
  863:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  864: 
  865:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  866:     unregister(RegName),
  867:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  868:     link(Child1),
  869:     unlink(Child1),
  870:     exit(Child1, die),
  871: 
  872:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  873: 
  874:     ok.
  875: procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  876:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  877:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  878: 
  879:     Tracee = self(),
  880:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  881:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  882:     unregister(RegName),
  883:     Child = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  884:     link(Child),
  885:     unlink(Child),
  886:     exit(Child, die),
  887:     receive_parallel(
  888:       {[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  889:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  890:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  891:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  892:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  893: 
  894:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  895:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  896:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  897:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  898:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  899: 
  900:        [{Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  901:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  902:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  903:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}],
  904: 
  905:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  906:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  907:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  908:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}]
  909:       }),
  910: 
  911:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  912:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  913:     unregister(RegName),
  914:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  915:     link(Child1),
  916:     unlink(Child1),
  917:     exit(Child1, die),
  918:     receive_parallel(
  919:       {[{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  920:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  921:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child1, '_'}},
  922:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  923:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  924: 
  925:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  926:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  927:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  928:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, exit, '_'}}]
  929:       }),
  930: 
  931:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  932:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  933:     unregister(RegName),
  934:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  935:     link(Child2),
  936:     unlink(Child2),
  937:     exit(Child2, die),
  938:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  939:     ok.
  940: 
  941: basic(_Config) ->
  942:     Tester = self(),
  943:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
  944:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
  945:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester) end),
  946: 
  947:     basic_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  948: 
  949:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  950:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  951:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  952: 
  953:     basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  954:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  955:     basic_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  956:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  957:     basic_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  958:               legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  959: 
  960:     basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  961:               S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  962:     basic_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  963:               S1, Tracer1, []),
  964: 
  965:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  966:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  967:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  968: 
  969:     unlink(Tracer0),
  970:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  971:     unlink(Tracer1),
  972:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  973:     unlink(Tracer2),
  974:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  975: 
  976:     ok.
  977: 
  978: basic_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  979:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs | Opts]),
  980: 
  981:     Tracee = self(),
  982:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  983:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  984:     unregister(RegName),
  985: 
  986:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  987:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  988: 
  989:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs | Opts]),
  990: 
  991:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  992:     unregister(RegName),
  993: 
  994:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  995: 
  996:     ok.
  997: 
  998: basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  999:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs | Opts1]),
 1000:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs | Opts2]),
 1001: 
 1002:     Tracee = self(),
 1003:     RegName = ?MODULE,
 1004:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1005:     unregister(RegName),
 1006: 
 1007:     receive_parallel({[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
 1008:                        {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}}],
 1009: 
 1010:                       [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
 1011:                        {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}}]}),
 1012: 
 1013:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs | Opts1]),
 1014: 
 1015:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1016:     unregister(RegName),
 1017: 
 1018:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
 1019:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
 1020: 
 1021:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs | Opts2]),
 1022: 
 1023:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1024:     unregister(RegName),
 1025: 
 1026:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1027: 
 1028:     ok.
 1029: 
 1030: 
 1031: call(_Config) ->
 1032:     Tester = self(),
 1033:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
 1034:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
 1035:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester) end),
 1036: 
 1037:     call_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
 1038: 
 1039:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
 1040:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1041:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
 1042: 
 1043:     [begin
 1044:          io:format("CallType = ~p\n", [CallType]),
 1045:          call_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
 1046:                   S2, Tracer2, [], CallType),
 1047:          call_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
 1048:                   S2, Tracer2, [], CallType),
 1049:          call_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
 1050:                   legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}], CallType),
 1051: 
 1052:          call_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
 1053:                   S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}], CallType),
 1054:          call_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
 1055:                   S1, Tracer1, [], CallType)
 1056:      end
 1057:      || CallType <- [
 1058:                      {[local], fun() -> foo() end},
 1059:                      {[global], fun() -> ?MODULE:foo() end},
 1060:                      {[local], fun() -> ?MODULE:foo() end}]
 1061:     ],
 1062: 
 1063:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
 1064:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
 1065:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
 1066: 
 1067:     unlink(Tracer0),
 1068:     exit(Tracer0, die),
 1069:     unlink(Tracer1),
 1070:     exit(Tracer1, die),
 1071:     unlink(Tracer2),
 1072:     exit(Tracer2, die),
 1073: 
 1074:     ok.
 1075: 
 1076: call_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
 1077:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1078:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1079:     Tracee = self(),
 1080:     1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, true, [call | Opts]),
 1081:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity, true, [local]),
 1082: 
 1083:     foo(),
 1084: 
 1085:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1086: 
 1087:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [call | Opts]),
 1088: 
 1089:     foo(),
 1090:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1091: 
 1092:     ok.
 1093: 
 1094: call_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2, {TPopt, Call}) ->
 1095:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1096:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1097:     Tracee = self(),
 1098:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Tracee, true, [call | Opts1]),
 1099:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, Tracee, true, [call | Opts2]),
 1100: 
 1101:     ?line,
 1102:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1103:     Call(),
 1104:     {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1105:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1106: 
 1107:     ?line,
 1108:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1109:     Call(),
 1110:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1111:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1112:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1113: 
 1114:     ?line,
 1115:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1116:     Call(),
 1117:     {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1118:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1119: 
 1120:     ?line,
 1121:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1122:     Call(),
 1123:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1124:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1125:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1126: 
 1127:     ?line,
 1128:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1129:     Call(),
 1130:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1131:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1132: 
 1133:     ?line,
 1134:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1135:     Call(),
 1136:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1137:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1138:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1139: 
 1140:     ?line,
 1141:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [call | Opts1]),
 1142:     Call(),
 1143:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1144:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1145: 
 1146:     ?line,
 1147:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1148:     Call(),
 1149:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1150: 
 1151:     ?line,
 1152:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1153:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [call | Opts2]),
 1154:     Call(),
 1155:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1156: 
 1157:     ok.
 1158: 
 1159: meta(_Config) ->
 1160:     Tester = self(),
 1161:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
 1162:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
 1163:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1164: 
 1165:     meta_do(legacy, Tracer0, S1, Tracer1),
 1166:     meta_do(S1, Tracer1, legacy, Tracer0),
 1167: 
 1168:     unlink(Tracer0),
 1169:     exit(Tracer0, die),
 1170:     unlink(Tracer1),
 1171:     exit(Tracer1, die),
 1172:     ok.
 1173: 
 1174: meta_do(S1, Tracer1, S2, Tracer2) ->
 1175:     Tester = self(),
 1176:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1177:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1178: 
 1179:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, [{meta,Tracer1}]),
 1180:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, [{meta,Tracer2}]),
 1181: 
 1182:     ?line,
 1183:     foo(),
 1184:     receive_parallel({[{Tracer1, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{'_','_','_'}}}],
 1185:                       [{Tracer2, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{'_','_','_'}}}]}),
 1186: 
 1187:     ?line,
 1188:     ?MODULE:foo(),
 1189:     receive_parallel({[{Tracer1, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{'_','_','_'}}}],
 1190:                       [{Tracer2, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{'_','_','_'}}}]}),
 1191: 
 1192:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, [meta]),
 1193: 
 1194:     ?line,
 1195:     foo(),
 1196:     {Tracer2, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{_,_,_}}} = receive_any(),
 1197: 
 1198:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, [meta]),
 1199:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1200: 
 1201:     ok.
 1202: 
 1203: return_to(_Config) ->
 1204:     %%put(display, true),  %% To get some usable debug printouts
 1205: 
 1206:     Tester = self(),
 1207:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester,get(display)) end),
 1208:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester,get(display)) end),
 1209: 
 1210:     Tracee = self(),
 1211:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1212:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
 1213: 
 1214:     1 = trace:process(S1, Tracee, true, [call, return_to, arity]),
 1215:     1 = trace:process(S2, Tracee, true, [call, return_to, arity]),
 1216: 
 1217:     [begin
 1218:          Traced = [{S1, Tracer1, Funcs1},
 1219:                    {S2, Tracer2, Funcs2}],
 1220: 
 1221:          %% Set up tracing for all sessions
 1222:          [begin
 1223:               trace:function(Session, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, false, [local]),
 1224:               [begin
 1225:                    io_format("trace:function(~p) for tracer ~p\n", [Func, Tracer]),
 1226:                    1 = trace:function(Session, {?MODULE,Func,'_'}, true, [local])
 1227:                end
 1228:                || Func <- TracedFuncs]
 1229:           end
 1230:           || {Session, Tracer, TracedFuncs} <- Traced],
 1231: 
 1232:          %% Execute test with both local and external calls
 1233:          [return_to_do(MiddleCall, BottomCall, Traced)
 1234:           || MiddleCall <- [local, extern],
 1235:              BottomCall <- [local, extern]]
 1236:      end
 1237:      || Funcs1 <- [[bottom], [middle], [middle,bottom]],
 1238:         Funcs2 <- [[bottom], [middle], [middle,bottom]]
 1239:     ],
 1240: 
 1241:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
 1242:     ok.
 1243: 
 1244: return_to_do(MiddleCall, BottomCall, Traced) ->
 1245:     Tracee = self(),
 1246:     Script = [{[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {body,BottomCall}, exception],
 1247:                #{[bottom] => [{call, bottom}, {return_to, top}],
 1248:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1249:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,top}]
 1250:                 }},
 1251: 
 1252:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {'catch',BottomCall}, exception],
 1253:                #{[bottom] => [{call, bottom}, {return_to, middle}],
 1254:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1255:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,middle}, {return_to,top}]
 1256:                 }},
 1257: 
 1258:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {tail,BottomCall}, exception],
 1259:                #{[bottom] => [{call, bottom}, {return_to, top}],
 1260:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1261:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,top}]
 1262:                 }},
 1263: 
 1264:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall},  {body,BottomCall}, return],
 1265:                #{[bottom] => [{call, bottom}, {return_to, middle}],
 1266:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1267:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,middle}, {return_to,top}]
 1268:                 }},
 1269: 
 1270:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {'catch',BottomCall}, return],
 1271:                #{[bottom] => [{call,bottom}, {return_to,middle}],
 1272:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1273:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,middle}, {return_to,top}]
 1274:                 }},
 1275: 
 1276:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {tail,BottomCall}, return],
 1277:                #{[bottom] => [{call,bottom}, {return_to,top}],
 1278:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1279:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,top}]
 1280:                 }}
 1281:              ],
 1282: 
 1283:     [begin
 1284:          %% Make the call sequence
 1285:          io_format("CallSequence = ~p\n", [CallSequence]),
 1286:          top(CallSequence),
 1287: 
 1288:          %% Construct expected trace messages
 1289:          Exp = [[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, CallOrReturnTo, {?MODULE, Func, 1}}}
 1290:                  || {CallOrReturnTo, Func} <- maps:get(TracedFuncs, TraceMap, [])]
 1291:                 || {_Session, Tracer, TracedFuncs} <- Traced],
 1292: 
 1293: 
 1294:          io_format("Exp = ~p\n", [Exp]),
 1295:          receive_parallel_list(Exp)
 1296:      end
 1297:      || {CallSequence, TraceMap} <- Script],
 1298:     ok.
 1299: 
 1300: top([{'catch',local} | T]) ->
 1301:     display("top(catch local)"),
 1302:     [(catch middle(T)) | 1];
 1303: top([{'catch',extern} | T]) ->
 1304:     display("top(catch extern)"),
 1305:     [(catch ?MODULE:middle(T)) | 1].
 1306: 
 1307: middle([{body,local} | T]) ->
 1308:     display("middle(local)"),
 1309:     [bottom(T) | 1];
 1310: middle([{body,extern} | T]) ->
 1311:     display("middle(extern)"),
 1312:     [?MODULE:bottom(T) | 1];
 1313: middle([{'catch',local} | T]) ->
 1314:     display("middle(catch local)"),
 1315:     [(catch bottom(T)) | 1];
 1316: middle([{'catch',extern} | T]) ->
 1317:     display("middle(catch extern)"),
 1318:     [(catch ?MODULE:bottom(T)) | 1];
 1319: middle([{tail,local} | T]) ->
 1320:     display("middle(tail local)"),
 1321:     bottom(T);
 1322: middle([{tail,extern} | T]) ->
 1323:     display("middle(tail extern)"),
 1324:     ?MODULE:bottom(T).
 1325: 
 1326: bottom([return | T]) ->
 1327:     display("bottom(return)"),
 1328:     T;
 1329: bottom([exception]) ->
 1330:     display("bottom(exception)"),
 1331:     error(exception).
 1332: 
 1333: display(Term) ->
 1334:     case get(display) of
 1335:         true ->
 1336:             erlang:display(Term);
 1337:         _ ->
 1338:             true
 1339:     end.
 1340: 
 1341: io_format(Frmt, List) ->
 1342:     case get(display) of
 1343:         true ->
 1344:             io:format(Frmt, List);
 1345:         _ ->
 1346:             ok
 1347:     end.
 1348: 
 1349: destroy(_Config) ->
 1350:     Name = ?MODULE,
 1351:     {_,SName1}=S1 = trace:session_create(Name, self(), []),
 1352: 
 1353:     %% Destroy session with trace_session_destroy
 1354:     destroy_do(SName1, fun() -> trace:session_destroy(S1) end),
 1355: 
 1356:     {_,SName2}=S2 = trace:session_create(Name, self(), []),
 1357: 
 1358:     %% Destroy session with GC (magic bin destructor)
 1359:     put(session, S2),
 1360:     destroy_do(SName2, fun() -> erase(session),
 1361:                                erlang:garbage_collect(),
 1362:                                wait_bp_finish(),
 1363:                                ok
 1364:                       end),
 1365: 
 1366:     ok.
 1367: 
 1368: destroy_do(SName, Destroyer) ->
 1369:     Exp = {?MODULE, exported, 1},
 1370:     Loc = {?MODULE, local, 1},
 1371:     CallMS = [{[arg],[],[]}],
 1372:     SendMS = [{[self(), message],[],[]}],
 1373:     RecvMS = [{[node(), self(), message],[],[]}],
 1374:     [Port|_] = erlang:ports(),
 1375: 
 1376:     1 = trace:function(SName, Exp, CallMS, [global]),
 1377:     1 = trace:function(SName, Loc, CallMS, [local]),
 1378:     0 = trace:function(SName, on_load, CallMS, [local]),
 1379:     1 = trace:send(SName, SendMS, []),
 1380:     1 = trace:recv(SName, RecvMS, []),
 1381:     0 = trace:process(SName, new_processes, true, [all]),
 1382:     0 = trace:port(SName, new_ports, true, [all]),
 1383:     1 = trace:process(SName, self(), true, [procs]),
 1384:     1 = trace:port(SName, Port, true, [ports]),
 1385: 
 1386:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Exp),
 1387:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Loc),
 1388:     [SName] = trace:session_info(on_load),
 1389:     SendSessions1 = trace:session_info(send),
 1390:     true = lists:member(SName, SendSessions1),
 1391:     RecvSessions1 = trace:session_info('receive'),
 1392:     true = lists:member(SName, RecvSessions1),
 1393:     [SName] = trace:session_info(new_processes),
 1394:     [SName] = trace:session_info(new_ports),
 1395:     [SName] = trace:session_info(self()),
 1396:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Port),
 1397: 
 1398:     {traced, global} = trace:info(SName, Exp, traced),
 1399:     {traced, local} = trace:info(SName, Loc, traced),
 1400:     {traced, local} = trace:info(SName, on_load, traced),
 1401:     {match_spec, SendMS} = trace:info(SName, send, match_spec),
 1402:     {match_spec, RecvMS} = trace:info(SName, 'receive', match_spec),
 1403:     {flags, [_|_]} = trace:info(SName, new_processes, flags),
 1404:     {flags, [_|_]} = trace:info(SName, new_ports, flags),
 1405:     {flags, [procs]} = trace:info(SName, self(), flags),
 1406:     {flags, [ports]} = trace:info(SName, Port, flags),
 1407: 
 1408:     Destroyer(),
 1409: 
 1410:     [] = trace:session_info(Exp),
 1411:     [] = trace:session_info(Loc),
 1412:     [] = trace:session_info(on_load),
 1413:     SendSessions2 = trace:session_info(send),
 1414:     false = lists:member(SName, SendSessions2),
 1415:     RecvSessions2 = trace:session_info('receive'),
 1416:     false = lists:member(SName, RecvSessions2),
 1417:     [] = trace:session_info(new_processes),
 1418:     [] = trace:session_info(new_ports),
 1419:     [] = trace:session_info(self()),
 1420:     [] = trace:session_info(Port),
 1421: 
 1422:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Exp, traced)),
 1423:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Loc, traced)),
 1424:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, on_load, traced)),
 1425:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, send, match_spec)),
 1426:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, 'receive', match_spec)),
 1427:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, new_processes, flags)),
 1428:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, new_ports, flags)),
 1429:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, self(), flags)),
 1430:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Port, flags)),
 1431:     true.
 1432: 
 1433: negative(_Config) ->
 1434:     Tracee = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1435:     SessionTracer = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1436:     OtherTracer = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1437:     MFA = {?MODULE, foo, 0},
 1438:     S = trace:session_create(?MODULE, SessionTracer, []),
 1439: 
 1440:     %% Specified tracer not allowed
 1441:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:process(S, Tracee, true, [call, {tracer,OtherTracer}])),
 1442:     1 = catch trace:process(S, Tracee, true, [call]),
 1443:     1 = catch trace:process(S, Tracee, false, [call]),
 1444: 
 1445:     %% Specified meta tracer not allowed
 1446:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:function(S, MFA, true, [{meta,OtherTracer}])),
 1447:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:function(S, MFA, true, [{meta,erl_tracer,OtherTracer}])),
 1448:     1 = trace:function(S, MFA, true, [meta]),
 1449:     1 = trace:function(S, MFA, false, [meta]),
 1450: 
 1451:     FuncInfoItems = [all, traced, match_spec, meta, meta_match_spec,
 1452:                      call_count, call_time, call_memory],
 1453:     [{Item,undefined} = trace:info(S, {?MODULE, false, 77}, Item)
 1454:      || Item <- FuncInfoItems],
 1455:     [{Item,false} = trace:info(S, MFA, Item)
 1456:      || Item <- FuncInfoItems],
 1457: 
 1458:     trace:session_destroy(S),
 1459:     ok.
 1460: 
 1461: %% Test error reporting of module 'trace'.
 1462: error_info(_Config) ->
 1463:     %% Pick up external pid and port.
 1464:     {ok, Peer, ExternalNode} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1465:     ExternalPid = rpc:call(ExternalNode, erlang, whereis, [code_server]),
 1466:     ExternalPort = hd(rpc:call(ExternalNode, erlang, ports, [])),
 1467:     Tracer = spawn(fun() -> receive never -> false end end),
 1468:     TraceSession = trace:session_create(?MODULE, Tracer, []),
 1469: 
 1470:     L = [
 1471:          {process, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1472:          {process, [TraceSession, ExternalPid, true, []]},
 1473:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), not_boolean, []]},
 1474:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, bad_flags]},
 1475:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, [bad_flag]]},
 1476:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, [call|send]]},
 1477: 
 1478:          {port, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1479:          {port, [TraceSession, ExternalPort, true, []]},
 1480:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), not_boolean, []]},
 1481:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, bad_flags]},
 1482:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, [bad_flag]]},
 1483:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, [send|'receive']]},
 1484: 
 1485: 
 1486:          {function, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1487:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, not_boolean, []]},
 1488:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, bad_flags]},
 1489:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1490:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [local|meta]]},
 1491:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, [{[self(), '_'],[],[]}], [call_count]]},
 1492: 
 1493:          {send, [TraceSession, a, []]},
 1494:          {send, [TraceSession, true, bad_flags]},
 1495:          {send, [TraceSession, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1496: 
 1497:          {recv, [TraceSession, a, []]},
 1498:          {recv, [TraceSession, true, bad_flags]},
 1499:          {recv, [TraceSession, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1500: 
 1501:          {info, [bad_session, self(), flags]},
 1502:          {info, [make_ref(), self(), flags]},
 1503:          {info, [atomics:new(1,[]), self(), flags]},
 1504:          {info, [TraceSession, ExternalPid, flags]},
 1505:          {info, [TraceSession, self(), bad_item]},
 1506: 
 1507:          {session_create, ["bad name", self(), []]},
 1508:          {session_create, [name, bad_tracer, []]},
 1509:          {session_create, [name, self(), bad_option]},
 1510:          {session_create, [name, self(), [bad_option]]},
 1511: 
 1512:          {session_destroy, [bad_session]},
 1513:          {session_destroy, [make_ref()]},
 1514:          {session_destroy, [atomics:new(1,[])]},
 1515: 
 1516:          {session_info, [ExternalPid]},
 1517: 
 1518:          {delivered, 2} %% Cannot fail
 1519:         ],
 1520: 
 1521:     try
 1522:         error_info_lib:test_error_info(trace, L, [allow_nyi])
 1523:     after
 1524:         peer:stop(Peer)
 1525:     end.
 1526: 
 1527: 
 1528: wait_bp_finish() ->
 1529:     wait_thread_progress(5).
 1530: 
 1531: wait_thread_progress(0) -> ok;
 1532: wait_thread_progress(N) ->
 1533:     ok = erts_debug:set_internal_state(wait, thread_progress),
 1534:     wait_thread_progress(N-1).
 1535: 
 1536: foo() ->
 1537:     ok.
 1538: 
 1539: exported(X) ->
 1540:     local(X).
 1541: 
 1542: local(_) ->
 1543:     ok.
 1544: 
 1545: tracer(Name, Tester) ->
 1546:     tracer(Name, Tester, true).
 1547: 
 1548: tracer(Name, Tester, Display) ->
 1549:     case Display of
 1550:         true -> put(display,true);
 1551:         _ -> ok
 1552:     end,
 1553:     tracer_loop(Name, Tester).
 1554: 
 1555: 
 1556: tracer_loop(Name, Tester) ->
 1557:     receive M ->
 1558:             io_format("~p ~p got message: ~p\n", [Name, self(), M]),
 1559:             Tester ! {self(), M}
 1560:     end,
 1561:     tracer_loop(Name, Tester).
 1562: 
 1563: 
 1564: receive_any() ->
 1565:     receive_any(1000).
 1566: 
 1567: receive_any(Timeout) ->
 1568:     receive M -> M
 1569:     after Timeout -> timeout
 1570:     end.
 1571: 
 1572: receive_nothing() ->
 1573:     receive_any(10).
 1574: 
 1575: %% Argument is a tuple of lists with expected messages to receive.
 1576: %% Each list is internally ordered according to expected reception.
 1577: %% The different lists in the tuple are mutually unordered.
 1578: %% '_' can be used as wildcard in message terms.
 1579: receive_parallel({}) ->
 1580:     ok;
 1581: receive_parallel(Tuple) ->
 1582:     M = receive_any(),
 1583:     receive_parallel(M, Tuple, tuple_size(Tuple)).
 1584: 
 1585: receive_parallel(M, Tuple, I) when I > 0 ->
 1586:     [Pattern|Tail] = element(I, Tuple),
 1587:     case {match(Pattern, M), Tail} of
 1588:         {true, []} ->
 1589:             receive_parallel(erlang:delete_element(I, Tuple));
 1590:         {true, _} ->
 1591:             receive_parallel(setelement(I, Tuple, Tail));
 1592:         {false, _} ->
 1593:             receive_parallel(M, Tuple, I-1)
 1594:     end;
 1595: receive_parallel(M, Tuple, 0) ->
 1596:     Failed = [H || [H|_] <- tuple_to_list(Tuple)],
 1597:     io:format("Expected any of:\n~p\n", [Failed]),
 1598:     io:format("Got message:\n~p\n", [M]),
 1599:     ct:fail("Unexpected messages: ~p", [M]).
 1600: 
 1601: %% Same as receive_parallel/1 but accepts a *list* of message lists
 1602: %% and the message lists are allowed to be empty meaning no expected messages.
 1603: receive_parallel_list(List0) ->
 1604:     List1 = lists:filter(fun(E) -> E =/= [] end, List0),
 1605:     receive_parallel(list_to_tuple(List1)).
 1606: 
 1607: receive_unsorted(Expect) ->
 1608:     receive_unsorted(Expect, length(Expect)).
 1609: 
 1610: receive_unsorted(Expect0, Cnt) when Cnt > 0 ->
 1611:     M = receive_any(),
 1612:     Expect1 = match_and_delete(M, Expect0, []),
 1613:     receive_unsorted(Expect1, Cnt-1);
 1614: receive_unsorted(_, 0) ->
 1615:     ok.
 1616: 
 1617: match_and_delete(M, [Pattern | Tail], Failed) ->
 1618:     case match(Pattern, M) of
 1619:         true -> Failed ++ Tail;
 1620:         false ->
 1621:             match_and_delete(M, Tail, [Pattern | Failed])
 1622:     end;
 1623: match_and_delete(M, [], Failed) ->
 1624:     io:format("Expected any of:\n~p\n", [Failed]),
 1625:     io:format("Got message:\n~p\n", [M]),
 1626:     ct:fail("Unexpected messages: ~p", [M]).
 1627: 
 1628: 
 1629: 
 1630: match(A, A) -> true;
 1631: match('_', _) -> true;
 1632: match([Ah|At], [Bh|Bt]) ->
 1633:     match(Ah, Bh) andalso match(At, Bt);
 1634: match(A, B) when tuple_size(A) =:= tuple_size(B) ->
 1635:     match(tuple_to_list(A), tuple_to_list(B));
 1636: match(_A, _B) ->
 1637:     false.
 1638: 
 1639: 
 1640: end_of_list(_Config) ->
 1641:     ok.
